description:
Warframe is a free-to-play online action game developed and published by Digital Extremes. It was first released in 2013 for Microsoft Windows and has since been ported to other platforms, including PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch.

In Warframe, players control members of the Tenno, an ancient race of warriors who have awoken from centuries of cryosleep to find themselves at war with different factions. The game is set in a science fiction universe where players can take on various missions, both solo and in multiplayer, to advance the storyline, acquire new weapons and Warframes (exoskeleton suits), and unlock additional content.

One of the defining features of Warframe is its fast-paced, acrobatic combat system. Players can perform a wide range of actions, including running along walls, performing aerial maneuvers, and executing devastating melee and ranged attacks. The game also emphasizes cooperative gameplay, allowing players to team up with others to tackle challenging missions or take part in player-versus-player (PvP) battles.

Warframe has a large and dedicated player community and is known for its frequent content updates, which introduce new missions, Warframes, weapons, and other gameplay elements. The game also features a deep customization system, allowing players to personalize their Warframes and weapons with various mods and upgrades.
name: Warframe
